LiteX - Ultra-fast TypeScript framework with Svelte 5 & Ultimate Express

🚀 Server-side rendering • ⚡ Real-time capabilities • 🎯 Seamless state management

🚀 Start in Seconds

HomeController.ts 
// ⚡ Ultra-fast setup
import { Response, Request } from "ultimate-express";
import { render } from "@inertiajs/svelte";

class HomeController {
    async index(req: Request, res: Response) {
        return render(res, "Home", {
            title: "⚡ LiteX Speed!"
        });
    }
}

export default new HomeController();

// 🚀 Route setup
router.get("/", HomeController.index);

🎯 Zero config • 🚀 Instant setup • ⚡ Maximum speed

⚡ Why LiteX is Super Fast?

🎨

Frontend

  • ⚡Svelte 5
  • 🔗Inertia.js
  • 🎯TailwindCSS
  • ⚡Vite Bundle
🚀

Backend

  • 🚀Ultimate Express
  • 📝TypeScript
  • 🔐JWT Auth
  • 🏗️MVC Pattern
💾

Database

  • ⚡Knex.js
  • 💨SQLite3
  • 🔥Redis Cache
  • 📧Nodemailer
